body_content.explanation: A badged person has a badge (= a small piece of metal or plastic carried or fastened to clothing) that shows who they are or that they belong to an organization or group:
examples: Only passengers with tickets and badged airport employees are allowed past security checkpoints.

body_content.explanation: A badged piece of clothing has a symbol or mark sewn onto it that shows which organization or group the person who wears it belongs to:
examples: All team members are given a badged blazer.
